duties_responsibilities.duty: Proactively build and maintain a pipeline of qualified candidates through cold calling, networking, and data mining.
Influence passive job seekers to pursue opportunities within the company.
Maintain the established recruiting requirements and review store positions, plans, and objectives with the VP of Talent on a weekly basis.
Determine applicant qualifications by interviewing applicants, analyzing responses, verifying references, and comparing qualifications to job requirements.
Coordinate management interviews and escort applicants to site visits when necessary.
Assist in the creation and execution of monthly/quarterly open house events and annual career fair schedule.
Evaluate applicants by discussing job requirements and qualifications with managers.
Assist with the coordination of the pilot Intern Program by conducting orientations and scheduling rotations/assignments.
Assist in the coordination of the onboarding process for new hires in collaboration with the Human Resources department.
Cultivate candidate touchpoints from application to hire.
Communicate with hiring managers and partners to share progress and escalate issues as needed.
Share market information and educate managers on current recruitment challenges/conditions.
Actively pursue job-specific training opportunities and professional networking organizations to increase success in the role.
Serve as a brand ambassador for the company.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Human Resources, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
